title: Leveraging the Laboratory Response Network Model for the Global Health Security Agenda
text:
Human resource development is critical to strengthening laboratory systems
Promoting a training culture similar to the LRN and leveraging existing APHL domestic and global partnerships for laboratory leadership and management will greatly enhance the capabilities of the biosurveillance workforce
'' 20 Nurturing laboratory leadership and management has to be supported for the effective oversight and administration of public health laboratory networks

title: Establishing benchmarks and metrics for disruptive technologies, inappropriate and obsolete tests in the clinical laboratory
text: Collaboration by subspecialty medical societies in disruptive technology development and improvements in routine clinical laboratory test utilization will be a fertile area for the development of benchmarks and metrics for future laboratory test utilization
authors: Kiechle, Frederick L.; Arcenas, Rodney C.; Rogers, Linda C.

title: Future Veterinary Diagnostics
text: Protein microarray technology has enormous potential for application within the veterinary diagnostic testing arena

title: Automatic online news monitoring and classification for syndromic surveillance
text: Thus, the current study provides important guidance and implications for future infectious disease specific classification component development for syndromic surveillance systems
